document_data.name: Rauvinwatch Keep
document_data.mainbody: '''Rauvinwatch Keep''' was the headquarters for the [[Argent Legion]], the grand army that comprised soldiers from the member-cities of the [[Luruar|Confederacy of the Silver Marches]].
document_data.Geography: The keep was situated just outside of [[Silverymoon]].
document_data.History: As of the {{YearlinkName|1372}}, Rauvinwatch was overseen by High Marshal [[Methrammar Aerasum√©]].
document_data.Inhabitants: While most of the Argent Legion served in locations throughout the Silver Marches, a contingent was left within the keep's walls.
